notes: Completely perfect, although not the best Civilization to ever be released.

title: Sid Meier's Civilization IV: Colonization
notes: It sometimes crashes when starting the actual game. (Closing other applications may help.) No issues during gameplay so far.

title: Sid Meier's Civilization IV: Colonization
notes: Starting or loading the game tends to crash.  I had best luck choosing "Play Now" to get into the game, then loading my save after that game started.  Once in the game, it seemed to work fine---no crashes and the only thing I noticed that was odd was that menu items didn't highlight (but could still be selected okay).

title: Sid Meier's Civilization IV: Colonization

notes: Zooming out turns the main view black, but leaves general UI visible. Trying to zoom back and forth to try and get some view back, the game becomes unresponsive.
title: Sid Meier's Civilization IV: Colonization

notes: Works great right out of the box. I hade issues with the scrolling using Nvidia drivers 390, but upgrading to 410 seems to have solved all problems
